caseTitle: Farrukh Raza Sheikh v. The Appellate Tribunal Inland Revenue, Lahore Bench through its Chairman and others
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: Portion of Rule 22(1) of the Appellate Tribunal Inland Revenue Rules, 2010 struck down as being ultra vires section 132(2) of the Income Tax Ordinance, 2001.
